contribution_desc: System and architecture for 'migratory' multi-modal interfaces in multi-device environments. Applications are implemented through web standards/technologies.
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted
crossdevice_def:
Migratory interfaces -- important distinction to cross-device.

"Migratory interfaces are interfaces that allow users to freely change device and still be able to continue the task from the point they left off in the previous one."
